text: John Atkinson (5 December 1884 – 26 November 1914) was a Scottish amateur footballer who played in the Scottish League for Hamilton Academical, Queen's Park, Celtic and Partick Thistle as an outside left. == Personal life == Atkinson was a medical student and later qualified as a doctor, moving to County Durham to practice. After the outbreak of the First World War in August 1914, he moved to work in Madagascar. He died in the Atlantic Ocean, off the west coast of Africa, in an accident on 26 November 1914. == Honours == Hamilton Academical * Lanarkshire Cup (2): 1904–05, 1905–06 == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |Scottish Cup ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="7" |Hamilton Academical |1904–05 | rowspan="2" |Scottish Second Division |0 |0 |0 |0 |3Appearances in Lanarkshire Cup |0 |3 |0 |- |1905–06 |17 |10 |3 |1 |73 appearances and 1 goal in Lanarkshire Cup, 2 appearances and 1 goal in Larkhall Charity Cup, 2 appearances in Scottish Qualifying Cup |2 |25 |13 |- |1906–07 | rowspan="4" |Scottish First Division |24 |4 |0 |0 |1Appearance in Scottish Qualifying Cup |0 |25 |4 |- |1907–08 |32 |9 |1 |0 |62 appearances and 2 goals in Scottish Qualifying Cup, 1 appearances in Lanarkshire Cup, 2 appearances in Larkhall Charity Cup |2 |39 |11 |- |1908–09 |3 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |3 |0 |- |1909–10 |21 |4 |2 |0 |0 |0 |23 |4 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !97 !27 !6 !1 !17 !4 !120 !32 |- |Queen's Park (loan) |1904–05 |Scottish First Division |4 |1 | colspan="2" |— | colspan="2" |— |4 |1 |- |Celtic (loan) |1908–09 |Scottish First Division |1 |2 | colspan="2" |— | colspan="2" |— |1 |2 |- |Partick Thistle (loan) |1909–10 |Scottish First Division |4 |1 | colspan="2" |— | colspan="2" |— |4 |1 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !106 !31 !6 !1 !17 !4 !129 !36 |} ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1914 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Cambuslang Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football outside forwards Category:Queen's Park F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Hamilton Academical F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Deaths by drowning
